Author: ravenslofty
Content: I am not entirely sure the tools could handle the power virus requirements of such an ASIC either

Author: mithro_
Content: That is exactly why the sky130 PDK is the way it is. Having every cell be a seperate gds file with stuff related to it in the same directory seems so logical to me. Lots of "industry people" hated the fact that the library was now a lot of files rather than one big file.

Author: mithro_
Content: The queue is currently sorted by upload time for the GDS.

Author: ravenslofty
Content: I figured it was a waste of everyone's time to check my initial GDS when the requirements had changed

Author: mithro_
Content: I had the crazy idea that we should have a "fill with artwork" tool that uses things like the wafer-space logo as the fill where it fits ðŸ˜› -- Probably a terrible idea.

Author: mithro_
Content: There is no reason a bitcoin minor would be *required* to have a power virus like profile. You are right that most groups are optimising their designs in a way that does produces results like that.

Author: mithro_
Content: Well, I've finally caught up with stuff on this channel, time to check the other ones!

Author: mithro_
Content: I need to take platform.wafer.space down for 30m - when it comes back up it should be able to run a lot more prechecks in parallel.
